body:
Perhaps it's safer to broadcast your labels by yourself explicitly. I'm afraid that the feature would be unexpected (or even wrong) for user in most cases. 

```python
labels=tf.constant(1., shape=(2,))
logits=tf.constant(1., shape=(50,2))
labels = labels + tf.zeros_like(logits)
tf.nn.softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(labels=labels, logits=logits)
```
